------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A trail in a forest. Youth in search of fun and flirting. A simulation game of war seems to be the ideal choice to spend time with friends in a pleasant way. But when the game becomes a hazard and real violent, surviving is no longer a game.
Six youths gather to play a game of Softair, a mode similar to paintball but uses air guns and plastic balls as ammunition. Only with training amateur to enjoy the game better, the friends follow a trail through the jungle to get a more real experience of combat. But the area they have chosen to be the scene of combat is a land in which three former military conduct illegal experiments. Determined to not let any of the young survive, a game of cat and mouse begins. Criminals with weapons of truth and experience. The young, running for their lives. What war games are started.
